name: EA SPORTS FC 25
shortDescription: Compete head-to-head in a knockout format and showcase your football skills.
longDescription: Compete head-to-head in a knockout format and showcase your football skills. Score, defend, and outplay opponents to claim championship glory. Bring your best moves and own the field!

name: MOCK STOCK
shortDescription: Battle in a virtual arena and test your financial skills.
longDescription: Battle in a virtual arena and test your financial skills. Participate in real-time market simulations to make strategic decisions. The challenge emphasizes risk management and investment tactics. Quick thinking and analysis are key to outperforming competitors. Showcase your financial acumen and strategy under pressure.

name: CLASH ROYALE
shortDescription: Enter the arena and build a winning battle deck.
longDescription: Enter the arena and build a winning battle deck. Outsmart opponents in fast-paced real-time battles. Adapt, attack, and prove your strategy to claim supremacy.

name: MAZE RUNNER
shortDescription: Robots enter a mapless maze and must autonomously find their way out.
longDescription: Robots enter a mapless maze and must autonomously find their way out. Smart algorithms and sensors guide them through twists and dead ends. A compact test of engineering, logic, and real-time strategy.

name: ROBO RACE
shortDescription: High-speed robots race through challenging tracks packed with sharp turns and obstacles.
longDescription: High-speed robots race through challenging tracks packed with sharp turns and obstacles. The event tests engineering precision, agility, and robust coding under pressure. Quick decision-making and control are crucial at every stage. Only the fastest and smartest machines make it to the finish.

name: BGMI
shortDescription: Gear up for the ultimate battle royale at TechSolstice 2026!
longDescription: Gear up for the ultimate battle royale at TechSolstice 2026! Form your squad, drop into intense matches, and outlast opponents. Whether casual or pro, fight for victory and claim your prize. Survive, strategise, and be the last team standing!

name: POP QUIZ
shortDescription: Fast, fun, and unpredictable, TechSolstice’s Pop Quiz is a true test of knowledge and reflexes.
longDescription: Fast, fun, and unpredictable, TechSolstice’s Pop Quiz is a true test of knowledge and reflexes. From tech to trivia, expect rapid-fire questions that challenge your memory and speed. Think quickly, answer faster, and rise above the rest to claim the win.

name: UI/UX DESIGN SPRINT
shortDescription: A timed design challenge focused on intuitive, user-friendly interfaces.
longDescription: A timed design challenge focused on intuitive, user-friendly interfaces. Participants create wireframes or prototypes based on a prompt. The event tests creativity, usability, and visual appeal. Clarity and effective design are crucial for success. Judging emphasizes aesthetics, functionality, and user experience.

name: MEME TECH
shortDescription: A creative video-meme competition with a tech theme.
longDescription: A creative video-meme competition with a tech theme. Entries are judged on humor, relevance, originality, and execution. Participants convey tech concepts in a fun and engaging way. The challenge encourages creativity and storytelling. A showcase of wit, imagination, and tech-savvy humor.

name: CODE WARS
shortDescription: A fast-paced, competitive programming contest under strict time limits.
longDescription: A fast-paced, competitive programming contest under strict time limits. Participants solve algorithmic and logic-based problems efficiently. Speed, accuracy, and optimal solutions define the winners.

name: GAME JAM
shortDescription: A fast-paced creative event where developers, designers, and storytellers build a game from scratch.
longDescription: Game Jam is a fast-paced creative event where developers, designers, and storytellers come together to build a game from scratch within a limited time. Just like an itch.io–style jam, participants receive a theme and race against the clock to turn their ideas into playable experiences. It’s a space to experiment, collaborate, learn, and ship - no pressure, just pure creativity, innovation, and fun.

name: ROBO WARS
shortDescription: Experience adrenaline-packed robotic combat as custom-built bots clash in an enclosed arena.
longDescription: Experience adrenaline-packed robotic combat as custom-built bots clash in an enclosed arena. Teams combine strategy, power, and precision in intense head-to-head battles. Only the strongest and smartest machines emerge victorious. Expect high-energy action, sparks, and engineering pushed to its absolute limits.

name: IPL BIDDING WARS
shortDescription: Step into the electrifying world of a fast-paced bidding war.
longDescription: Step into the electrifying world of a fast-paced bidding war. Experience the thrill of strategy, skill, and quick decision-making. The event mirrors the excitement of an IPL-style auction. Expect unexpected twists, turns, and high-stakes moments. A battle where strategy and speed determine the winner.

name: WEBCRAFT
shortDescription: A web development challenge focused on modern, responsive websites.
longDescription: A web development challenge focused on modern, responsive websites. Teams build theme-based solutions using strong front-end and design practices. Judging emphasises UI/UX, creativity, responsiveness, and usability. Innovative and user-centric designs are highly encouraged.

name: CHECKPOINT: CHESS
shortDescription: A battle of minds where every move matters.
longDescription: A battle of minds where every move matters, TechSolstice’s Chess Arena tests strategy, foresight, and calm under pressure. Outsmart your opponent, plan your endgame, and prove that patience and precision are the ultimate weapons. Only the sharpest minds checkmate their way to victory.

name: DIGITAL ART
shortDescription: An individual creative event where participants design original digital artwork.
longDescription: An individual creative event where participants design original digital artwork. Entries are judged on creativity, originality, and visual impact. Participants can use any digital art style or technique. The challenge encourages artistic expression and innovation. A showcase of talent, imagination, and digital creativity.

name: COSMO CLENCH
shortDescription: A precision robotics challenge where grabber bots navigate obstacle-filled courses.
longDescription: A precision robotics challenge where grabber bots navigate obstacle-filled courses. Teams must pick and place objects with speed, control, and accuracy. Only the most agile and precise robots succeed under pressure.

name: SHARK TANK
shortDescription: Showcase your entrepreneurial pitch to a panel of experienced investors, the “Sharks”.
longDescription: Showcase your entrepreneurial pitch to a panel of experienced investors, the “Sharks”. The competition blends innovation, strategy, and investment potential. Budding ideas are evaluated for feasibility and impact. Turn your vision into real-world opportunities.

name: EDM MUSIC & PRODUCTION
shortDescription: An individual competition to create an original electronic music track.
longDescription: An individual competition to create an original electronic music track. Participants are judged on creativity, composition, and production quality. Any DAW or digital tool may be used. The event encourages innovation and musical expression. A showcase of talent, imagination, and sound design skills.

name: VALORANT
shortDescription: Assemble your squad and strategize for intense 5v5 battles.
longDescription: Assemble your squad and strategize for intense 5v5 battles. Showcase teamwork, skill, and quick thinking to dominate the arena. Rise to glory and grab your share of the rewards. Precision, coordination, and tactics will lead you to victory!

name: BUSINESS CASE STUDY
shortDescription: A fast-paced battle of wits, testing instincts and quick thinking.
longDescription: A fast-paced battle of wits, testing instincts and quick thinking. Participants present and defend effective solutions under pressure. A true test of strategy, persuasion, and problem-solving skills. Only the sharpest minds and strongest ideas stand out.

name: CRYPTOQUEST
shortDescription: Think you’re the king of the Crypto Market? Prove your worth in this trading simulation.
longDescription: Think you’re the king of the Crypto Market? Prove your worth by putting money where your mouth is and showcase your talent in this no holds barred cryptocurrency trading simulation and come out on top.

name: COMPUTER VISION SHOWDOWN
shortDescription: A computer vision challenge focused on image processing tasks.
longDescription: A computer vision challenge focused on image processing tasks. Participants tackle problems like classification, detection, and visual analysis. The event emphasizes accuracy, efficiency, and innovative solutions. Teams apply practical AI techniques to real-world scenarios. Creativity and precision are highly rewarded.

name: AI ARENA
shortDescription: An AI/ML-focused challenge featuring image recognition, data analysis, and creative applications.
longDescription: An AI/ML-focused challenge featuring image recognition, data analysis, and creative applications. Participants showcase skills in model building, data handling, and analytics. The event emphasizes applying AI to real-world problems. Judging prioritizes practical implementation, accuracy, and innovation.

name: 36 - HOUR HACKATHON
shortDescription: A flagship 36-hour hackathon where teams build innovative solutions from scratch.
longDescription: A flagship 36-hour hackathon where teams build innovative solutions from scratch. Participants tackle real-world challenges across AI, sustainability, healthcare, and fintech. Judging focuses on innovation, feasibility, and real-world impact.

name: TREASURE HUNT
shortDescription: An adventure that blends puzzles riddles and thrills.
longDescription: An adventure that blends puzzles riddles and thrills, TechSolstice’s Treasure Hunt is all about wit and speed. Gather your team, crack codes and race against time to uncover hidden secrets. Here, cleverness and teamwork lead to victory.

name: CTF - CAPTURE THE FLAG
shortDescription: A competitive cybersecurity challenge where teams uncover hidden flags.
longDescription: A competitive cybersecurity challenge where teams uncover hidden flags. Tasks span cryptography, web exploitation, reverse engineering, and forensics. Strategy, accuracy, and problem-solving speed decide the winners.

name: COD MOBILE
shortDescription: Test your combat skills in fast, action-packed COD Mobile battles.
longDescription: Test your combat skills in fast, action-packed COD Mobile battles. Open to veterans and newcomers alike, fight for supremacy. Claim your prize by proving you’ve got what it takes.

name: TECH QUIZ
shortDescription: A concept-driven quiz covering technology fundamentals, logic, and current tech trends.
longDescription: A concept-driven quiz covering technology fundamentals, logic, and current tech trends. Multiple rounds test speed, accuracy, and analytical thinking. Teams must demonstrate both depth and breadth of technical knowledge. Ideal for those with strong technical awareness and quick problem-solving skills.

name: LINE FOLLOWER
shortDescription: Watch precision engineering come alive as autonomous robots race to follow a twisting track.
longDescription: Watch precision engineering come alive as autonomous robots race to follow a twisting track. Using only sensors, logic, and control systems, every move must be calculated. The challenge tests accuracy, speed, and intelligent design. Every millisecond counts in this thrilling display of robotics excellence.
